title: Game Crashing
body: This has happened a few time in the past and I have gotten leave-buster but it is getting really annoying... especially when I am trying to que with friends. When the client launches the game it crashes from time to time (and yes, I have repaired my client because of this, yet it still happens.) and it simply gives me leave-buster. Is there any way to fix this for good?

replies.body: When this happens, do you see a specific error message such as "Bugsplat" or "Check your connection"? With this info, I can provide a proper solution to the issue you're seeing.
